price: 21. Kaadu ummaan nafsi yamaateh, warraysee kee sumaaqité teetî luk anuk malaykak.
arabic: وَجَآءَتۡ كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ مَّعَهَا سَآئِقٞ وَشَهِيدٞ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wajāat kullu nafsin maʿahā sāiqun washahīdun
